TopicTitle: KSP 1.4.2 - FMRS takes ages to load, game takes ages to turn off etc.

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone!

I'm experiencing very nasty problem with my KSP which makes it nearly unplayable. First of all my game loads in around 5 to 10 minutes, having a few mods installed and having quite a beast of a machine (in relation to KSP requirements), which is:

  • i5-7300 2,5 Ghz
  • 8GB RAM
  • GeForce GTX 1050 Ti with 4GM ram

I run the game on an SSD drive, with pagefile being automatically controlled by system (Windows 10).

After game loads its all fine, untill I play a while and then I go for some payload launches. Recently I put a refuelling station on Mun and wanted to go back to my reusable stages, and fly them back to Kerbin, using FMRS. I was waiting about 5-10 minutes before the game rolled back to the moment of stage separation.

Same happens when I try to turn off the game - it takes ageeeeeeees to properly shut it down.

I'd appreciate any help given, log file below:

https://ufile.io/wn7yi
